annotations.text: Option to renew for a further 21 years. Renewal will be granted on the request of Socfin Agricultural Company (S.L.), provided notice is given 6 calendar months prior to the expiration of the term and there are no subsisting breaches of Socfin Agricultural Company (S.L.)'s obligations under the current contract. The rent during the first 7 years of this period will be the same as the rent payable in the 50th year. The rent for the next 7 years will be subject to an upward review (not to exceed 17.5% of the rent immediately payable before the review). and the rent for the final 7 years will also be subject to an upward review (not to exceed 17.5% of the rent immediately payable before the review).

annotations.category: Type of resources (mineral type, crude oil, gas, timber, etc.) OR specific crops planned (ex:  food crops, oil palm, etc.)
Protection of sacred locations, resources and environment
Outgrowers Program (details, additional land provided, etc)

Requirements regarding workers or farm/concession dwellers within concession areas or in nearby communities in respect of occupational health and safety, access to clean water, housing, medical care, or education
Physical security, protection of property, and/or use of guards
Grievance mechanisms for non-contractual harms to non-contracting parties
Rights of non-contracting parties to access/use concession area (including permitted independent farming in concession area)
Other income tax features (amortization, deductibility of expenses, loss carry forward, ring-fencing)
Production Share - "Cost Oil" features  (basis of calculation, limits on cost recovery - e.g. as % of revenue or production, capex uplift, etc.)
Production Share - "Profit Oil" features  (triggers for variations in split - IRR, "r" factor, production, etc.)
Service Agreement - Fee to developer / contractor (basis for calculation)
Withholding tax on payment of interest and/or dividends
Witholding tax on services of non-resident companies
Fixed fee for grant and renewal of license

annotations.text: Annual rent of $5 (or the equivalent at the local Commercial Bank selling rate on the date of payment) per acre payable per annum with an upward rent review after every 7 years, with such rent review not exceeding more than 17.5% of the rent immediately payable prior to that review

annotations.category: Restrictions on transactions with affiliated parties
Social, environmental and/or human rights impact assessments, as well as related management plans
Social, environmental and/or human rights monitoring requirements
Right to take and/or use water within/near contract concession area (including fees, licenses, and permits required)
Other requirements regarding protection of the environment (including prevention of pollution and watercourse protection)
Feasibility studies and requirement of business plan

annotations.text: Socfin Agricultural Company (S.L.) has discretion to erect new structures on the land and is required to keep any structure erected or placed on the land in tenantable repair

annotations.category: Marketing of output and state access to output
Contracting party's permitted use of public or private land outside concession area
Governing law in case of dispute

annotations.text: All disputes must be referred to arbitrators in London under the Rules of Arbitration of the International Chamber of Commerce for final resolution. The award in such arbitrations shall be final and binding on all parties (or any party claiming under or through them)

Socfin Agricultural Company (S.L.) is not permitted to assign or sublet any part of the land without the Ministry of Agriculture, Forestry and Food Security's consent in writing. The Ministry of Agriculture, Forestry and Food Security must not unreasonably, arbitrarily or veraciously withhold its consent.

Socfin Agricultural Company (S.L.) must deliver to the Ministry of Agriculture, Forestry and Food Security the land and all the Ministry of Agriculture, Forestry and Food Security's fixtures and additions (excluding those added by Socfin Agricultural Company (S.L.)) in good and tenantable repair upon the expiration or determination of the term of the sub-lease. Socfin Agricultural Company (S.L.) can surrender any part of the land at any time before the 7th anniversary of the lease by providing 1 month's written notice (expressing its intention to surrender the land) to the lessor. The Ministry of Agriculture, Forestry and Food Security may re-enter the land, resume possession and determine the lease if rent remains unpaid for 1 year. No breach of any covenant or condition by Socfin Agricultural Company (S.L.) shall end the lease or give any right of re-entry to the Ministry of Agriculture, Forestry and Food Security unless and until the Ministry of Agriculture, Forestry and Food Security has given Socfin Agricultural Company (S.L.) a notice in writing of the breach and Socfin Agricultural Company (S.L.) has not rectified the breach or provided compensation 3 calendar months after the provision of the notice.

The Ministry of Agriculture, Forestry and Food Security must pay the rent reserved by the Head Lease and perform and observe all the obligations thereunder. The Ministry of Agriculture, Forestry and Food Security will indemnify Socfin Agricultural Company (S.L.) against all actions, claims, proceedings, costs and damages and all legal costs or other expenses arising as a result of this covenant
